A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It's 3 hours of an elite battleship armada struggling to shoot down a rebel ship that just sort of ran out of gas. A bunch of other boring and forgettable things happen that just tear open plot holes and make the 3 hour grind even more tortuously bad.\n\nIf you don't care about literally anything else that has ever happened in the Star Wars universe\, the movie might be kind of ok. Otherwise\, this just serves to kill the franchise in the biggest whimper ever.
